Package edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop

Interface Summary
WordCooccurrence An abstraction of a word co-occurrence as extracted by the Hadoop processing classes.
 

Class Summary
CooccurrenceExtractor An common implementation that provides functionality for processing a Text document and recording word co-occurrences to a Mapper.Context.
CooccurrenceReducer A Reducer that transforms the co-occurrence of they input key with another word at a certan position to a count of how many times that co-occurrence took place.
HadoopJob A Hadoop utility class for executing a job in the Hadoop map-reduce engine.
HadoopJobResults A class that encapsulates the resulting output files of a Hadoop job and provides file system access to those files using the FileSystem on which they are stored.
RawTextCooccurrenceMapper A Mapper implementation that maps a the text values of a document to the word co-occurrences.
SimpleWordCooccurrence A straigh-forward implementation of WordCooccurrence.
TextIntWritable A special-purpose tuple Writable for storing text and int values together in one object.
WordCooccurrenceCountingJob A hadoop utility that spawns a job to count all the co-occurrences for a directory of files within the Hadoop File System.
WordCooccurrenceWritable A Writable that represents the occurrence of a two words a certain distance apart.
